Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.
Read the â€˜Learn moreâ€™ information and tap the â€˜Invite new memberâ€™ button.
Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.
If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.
Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once youâ€™ve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.
Confirm the â€˜Send Inviteâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile device.
Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content: For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.From the â€˜Participantsâ€™ list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participantâ€™s name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.Tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Â Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜revoke power of attorneyâ€™.Â Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with â€˜Pendingâ€™ and the Shared Space icon. Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.Once youâ€™ve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the â€˜Accept power of attorneyâ€™ button.Enter your Confirmation PIN.Confirm the â€˜Accept Power of Attorneyâ€™ push notification on your paired mobile deviceYouâ€™ll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up â€¦ Space.You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).To leave a Shared Space:In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.Inside the settings tap on â€˜Exit Shared Spaceâ€™.Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap â€˜Leave the Spaceâ€™.A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or WebappLearn moreWhat are Shared Spaces

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content: The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).Â Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the â€œOwnerâ€, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:Â Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.Â Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.Â Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Ownerâ€™s Main Account)By granting a person Power of Attorney, theyâ€™ll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.Â N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.Learn moreWhat are Shared Spaces

title: How to get a loan?
content: (Applies to Germany and France)With N26 Credit, weâ€™ve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between â‚¬1.000 to â‚¬50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products: Weâ€™ll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (youâ€™ll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if youâ€™ve used N26 for less than 6 months).Prove your identity: Weâ€™ll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if youâ€™re a non-EU citizen, youâ€™ll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.Edit your answers during the application process: Once youâ€™re happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and weâ€™ll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you wonâ€™t be able to request another loan during that time.Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, youâ€™ll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if youÂ change your planÂ or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.For more information, see the N26 CreditÂ T&Cs(new tab).

title: How to revoke my loan application?
content: N26 CreditÂ revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.Weâ€™ll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so itâ€™s best to chat with us about this. Weâ€™ll take it from there and let you know via email when itâ€™s done.Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

title: How to repay my loan early?
content: You can always repay yourÂ N26 CreditÂ loan early. Keep in mind that an early repayment fee of up to 1% applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is up to 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and weâ€™ll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content: We offer repayment plans if you canâ€™t repay yourÂ overdraftÂ or loan withÂ N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.Hereâ€™s how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how youâ€™re going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We donâ€™t accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. Itâ€™s then up to you to confirm it.By the way: your account will be closed if itâ€™s negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, and Switzerland)Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.Weâ€™ve made aÂ video(new tab)Â to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.Some tips to keep in mind:Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).
If youâ€™ve lost your iPhone and arenâ€™t able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.
If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card wonâ€™t be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.
For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If youâ€™re using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if youâ€™re using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.
If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.
Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and webApple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and storesiPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and webMacs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: How to use Google Pay?
content: Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you donâ€™t have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. Weâ€™ll ask you to confirm your payment viaÂ push messageÂ during checkout.Some tips to keep in mind:To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. Youâ€™ll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didnâ€™t set it up yet, youâ€™ll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.If youâ€™re protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals donâ€™t recognize your phone if the case is too big.If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didnâ€™t hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content: You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account, in the mobile app orÂ N26 WebApp.(new tab) To invite friends:on iOS:Log into the mobile app and tap on the Explore tab next to the + button.Tap on Refer friends.Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.Select one of the options available for sharing. Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.on Android:Log into the mobile app, then go to My Account ğŸ‘¤ and select the gift icon.Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.Tap Tell a friend.Select one of the options available for sharing.Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.Find out how you can be rewarded for your referrals with ourÂ Refer a Friend ProgramÂ (available in select countries).

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content: You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or theÂ Web app(new tab)).To know the amount you can get per referral, simply access the Refer friends section:Log into the N26 app.From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab (mobile app) or My account ğŸ‘¤ (N26 Web app).Select Refer friends.Tap on your Referral Code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing.Optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default. Tap Send!To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.Activate their Mastercard.Complete a first Mastercard transaction worth at least the value of the referral reward (in-store, online or ATM).Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.Â You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.In total,  you can get up to â‚¬1500 out of referrals.If your referral bonus hasnâ€™t arrived yet, weâ€™ve also collected aÂ few reasons why.*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.Currently,Â Friend referralÂ rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.You can find more information in the Refer a Friend ProgramÂ T&Cs(new tab).

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content: Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of ourÂ Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app orÂ WebApp(new tab)Â to check your reward status.In most cases the referral bonus isnâ€™t rewarded because the invited friend hasnâ€™t made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates theÂ Terms and Conditions(new tab).Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content: We collaborate with many partners. Thatâ€™s why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldnâ€™t be eligible for certain products:Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).Youâ€™re taxable in the United States. If so, you wonâ€™t be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). Weâ€™ll have to reset your account and youâ€™ll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, weâ€™ll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content: We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback toÂ ideas@n26.com(new tab). Weâ€™re always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can alsoÂ file a complaint.

title: How to get push messages?
content: We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such asÂ MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as withÂ CASH26- please note this is only available in Germany, Austria, Italy). If you arenâ€™t receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:iOS:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.Check whether youâ€™re logged into your N26 app.Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.Android:Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content: To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box â€œI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customerâ€.All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, youâ€™ll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.Why do I need to be visible to other N26 users

title: Can I download the N26 app on my smartphone?
content: You can check and download the last version of the N26 app from the AppleÂ App Store(new tab)Â or theÂ Google Play Store(new tab).The minimum requirements for iPhones  (you can find your iOS version under Settings > General > Info):Model 5s or neweriOS 11 or aboveThe minimum requirements for Android (you can find your Android version under Settings > About your device):Android 6.0. or above Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to contact N26?
content:
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles. As an online bank we don't have branches.First of all, make sure you're up-to-date with the newest version of the app. If not, update your app in the Apple App Store(new tab) or the Google Play Store(new tab).When accessing your account from our WebApp(new tab), you can find the chat in the bottom right corner.Â 

Or from your paired smartphone, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Support. Then scroll down and tap Support chat under Get in touch.Â 

Youâ€™ll then see your place in the queue. Keep your Mastercard close by, it's optional but you'll get faster service.Our chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Please visit this article if you represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26(new tab).

title: Why is N26 secure?
content: To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:Secure login.Â Your login details of both the mobile andÂ WebApp(new tab)Â consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose aÂ secure passwordÂ and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.Confirmation PIN.Â ThisÂ 4-digit codeÂ is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can thenÂ change itÂ in the app yourself after that.Push messages.Â For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to yourÂ connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also addedÂ 3D SecureÂ to protect you from online card fraud.Every time you contact us weâ€™ll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But weâ€™ll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.Weâ€™ve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You canÂ download your personal dataÂ up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in ourÂ Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: How to protect my account?
content: The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, itâ€™s crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password and donâ€™t reveal your login details to anyone.As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. If youâ€™d rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. Weâ€™ll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 
Please be assured that weâ€™ll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126 or +49 303 6428 6881 (both lines in English) .

title: Can N26 close my account?
content: In short: yes.We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support canâ€™t provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. Youâ€™re also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason.2 months notice:We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)Â or Â§ 675h of the German Civil Code).14 days notice:We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:Using a personal account for business purposes.Â According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If youâ€™d like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business, N26 Business You or N26 Business Metal account.Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. Weâ€™re a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you donâ€™t provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We donâ€™t tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.Immediate cancellationWe may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of ourÂ T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: How to protect my identity?
content: To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content: In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked toÂ confirm your mobile phone number.Enter theÂ 4-digit code we send you via SMSÂ and your phone is paired. If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device forÂ security reasons. You can do this inÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ (mobile app) or in theÂ Web app(new tab)Â underÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ thenÂ Security Settings if you donâ€™t have access to your smartphone anymore. Youâ€™ll receive an email from us with further instructions.If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes â€“ a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content: You can change yourÂ Confirmation PINÂ at any time in the app:Go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))Select Change Confirmation PINEnter the 10-digit token number on your MastercardCreate and confirm your new Confirmation PINIf you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.For security reasons, your PIN canâ€™t contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN youâ€™ve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.Prefer a video over text

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content: A pairing code is required toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ to your account. If you didnâ€™t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons youâ€™ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, itâ€™s likely that youâ€™ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: How to create a password?
content: If you forgot your password or want to change it, selectÂ Forgot

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content: What is Two-Factor Authentication

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content: If you donâ€™t recognize a transaction or youâ€™re sure you didnâ€™t authorize it,Â blocking your cardÂ wonâ€™t be enough. In these cases you should immediately:Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also useÂ CASH26Â for cash withdrawals.You should keep in mind that changes in theÂ final amount debitedÂ from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content: We offer you banking in real-time. This means youâ€™re able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldnâ€™t see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:Authorizations.Â A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).Presentments.Â The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.Once an authorization has been confirmed, we canâ€™t cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen toÂ your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expiresÂ (and automatically returns to your account after 12 days at the latest. Car rental deposits may need up to 30 days to return to your account). Keep in mind:Sometimes youâ€™ll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesnâ€™t, we can help get your money back.Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content: Is there a card transaction on your N26 monthly statement that you did not make

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)Â insures all depositsÂ up to â‚¬100.000Â held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content: We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds.We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your accountâ€™s security (see GwG Â§ 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.Â As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.Â This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message youâ€™ll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.Â Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.Â Our Customer Support doesnâ€™t have any additional information on this subject.You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.
 Find here some examples:You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

Utilisez un appareil photo de qualitÃ©.Si vous utilisez Android, assurez vous de la qualitÃ© de lâ€™autofocus.Si vous utilisez Android, vous pouvez activer ou dÃ©sactiver le flash en fonction de la luminositÃ© ambiante.Prenez une photo de vous-mÃªme (un selfie) et de votre document d'identitÃ©, en vous assurant que rien ne cache votre visage et en plaÃ§ant lâ€™objectif de votre tÃ©lÃ©phone Ã  la hauteur de vos yeux.Veillez Ã  ce que vous soyez la seule personne Ã  apparaÃ®tre sur votre selfie et que votre document d'identitÃ© soit entiÃ¨rement visible.VÃ©rifiez vos documentsNous nâ€™acceptons que les photos de lâ€™original de votre document dâ€™identitÃ©.Le document dâ€™identitÃ© principal que vous devez nous prÃ©senter peut Ãªtre votre passeport ou votre carte dâ€™identitÃ© s'ils sont acceptÃ©s par nos services.Gardez votre document bien Ã  plat pendant la prise de vue et assurez-vous que toutes les informations sont lisibles.Assurez-vous que votre document nâ€™est pas abimÃ©.Si votre selfie ou les photos de votre document d'identitÃ© ne sont pas dâ€™une qualitÃ© suffisante, recommencez la procÃ©dure de vÃ©rification dâ€™identitÃ© depuis le dÃ©but.DÃ¨s que la vÃ©rification de votre identitÃ© est terminÃ©e, nous enverrons votre Mastercard N26. content: Nous collaborons avec diffÃ©rents partenaires afin de proposer des services financiers innovants supplÃ©mentaires. Certains de nos partenaires, tout comme N26, doivent vÃ©rifier votre identitÃ©, câ€™est pourquoi nous leur fournissons les informations Ã  notre disposition concernant votre identitÃ©, Ã  condition que vous nous ayez prÃ©alablement donnÃ© votre accord.Voici les raisons les plus frÃ©quentes pour lesquelles vous ne pouvez pas accÃ©der Ã  certains produits ou fonctionnalitÃ©s :Vos documents dâ€™identitÃ© ont expirÃ© ou ne sont pas acceptÃ©s (câ€™est par exemple le cas pour certains passeports qui ne disposent pas de tous les Ã©lÃ©ments de sÃ©curitÃ© nÃ©cessaires).Vous ÃªtesÂ imposable(nouvel onglet)Â aux Etats-Unis. TÃ©lÃ©chargez et installez la derniÃ¨re version de lâ€™application depuis le Play Store de Google et connectez-vous Ã  nouveau.Rendez vous dans Mon compte, puis ParamÃ¨tres, ParamÃ¨tres de lâ€™application, Notifications, cochez toutes les cases sous lâ€™icÃ´ne du tÃ©lÃ©phone et choisissez 0 â‚¬ pour les deux seuils.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones Huawei et Xiaomi : allez dans ParamÃ¨tres, puis ParamÃ¨tres avancÃ©s et ParamÃ¨tres batterie, et dÃ©finissez N26 comme une application protÃ©gÃ©e.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones OnePlus : sÃ©lectionnez optimisation de la batterie, puis lâ€™application N26 et choisissez de ne pas lâ€™optimiser.Pour les tÃ©lÃ©phones Oppo : dÃ©sactivez lâ€™optimisation de la batterie pour lâ€™application N26

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content: We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet ourÂ requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content: If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you mayÂ open an account with us. We offer:The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.Accounts in â‚¬, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.Free shipping of your Mastercard or â‚¬25 for express.Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals in â‚¬ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).2 Spaces in addition to the main account.A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.For outgoing transfers to â‚¬ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-â‚¬ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.**Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: How to open my N26 account?
content: You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:are at least 18 years oldare a resident of a supported countryown a compatible smartphonehold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))don't already have an account with usare able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French.This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). After a few days, youâ€™ll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you donâ€™t, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to prove my identity?
content: As a licensed bank, itâ€™s important that we know who our customers are. Thatâ€™s why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. Weâ€™ve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:I live in Germany(new tab)I live in Spain(new tab)I live in Italy(new tab)I live in a different country(new tab)If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.Â

title: Why isnâ€™t my photo verification working?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to all regions except GermanyFirst, geolocation must be enabled. Then review theÂ guide(new tab)Â weâ€™ve created to help you take the best pictures.Most photoÂ verificationsÂ fail due to bad picture quality.Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).Make sure youâ€™re the only person in the photo.Check your document.We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.We only accept national IDs and passports.Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesnâ€™t go through, you can just start over again.As soon as your verification is complete, weâ€™ll send you your N26 Mastercard.Â DeliveriesÂ take up to 10 days.Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.Â

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content: (Applies to all French residents)According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte Ã©tranger ouvert, utilisÃ© ou fermÃ©).Complete the Cerfa nÂ° 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).Â In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ (see below).If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.â€œSubstantial Presence Testâ€ means:That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar yearORThat you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 

(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.Â In addition, if your account shows any of the following:U.S. citizenship or U.S. residenceU.S. place of birthU.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxesU.S. telephone numberStanding instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the USwe're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:Â A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form andA non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content: The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country youâ€™re taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: You live in a ECR participating country.You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).Youâ€™re married to a U.S. national.You gave us an address in the U.S.You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settingsSelect Personal settings then Tax informationSelect the country in which youâ€™re tax-liableEnter either your tax identification number or your social security numberImportant informationIn Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).If youâ€™re not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.Weâ€™re unable to advise you on your tax status. If youâ€™re unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.If youâ€™ve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content: We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: weâ€™ll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and weâ€™ll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.This is how you can make N26 your main account:Account switching service powered by finleapTogether with our partner finleap weâ€™re offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. Itâ€™s an automated process and completely free.To begin, use ourÂ form(new tab)Â and log in with your previous bank account details. Once youâ€™ve filled in all required information, itâ€™ll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to close my account?
content: We are sorry to see you go, but we appreciate the time you spent with us as a customer. You have convenient options to close your N26 account.If you have a DE or ES IBANYou can use the following methods to request account closure:Option 1: Click here(new tab) to be guided through our electronic account closure process:This option is the fastest way to close your account.You will need to login to authenticate yourself.You will be guided through the process to close your account.If you cannot log in or do not want to, please follow the steps for Option 2.Option 2: Please contact us via live chat or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information):A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP.Your name.Your N26 IBAN.If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA to transfer your remaining balance.If you have an IT IBANYou can use the following method to request account closure:Please send your request through live chat (click the Start New Support Chat button below) or via email to closure@n26.com(new tab) from your registered email address using our cancellation form(new tab) (the form will require the below information):A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP.Your name.Your N26 IBAN.If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA to transfer your remaining balance.A few things to consider when closing your account:For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a paper shredder. The chip, NFC antenna and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. (For cards that cannot be easily destroyed by cutting, please store your card in a safe place.)

title: How to download my personal data?
content: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. Weâ€™ve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and youâ€™re in complete control: go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. Â It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.Â As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.Â Â How to download your dataYou can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.Current customers:Please request your data through our web form(new tab).You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.Former customers:You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. Youâ€™ll need to know:the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,the registered email address of the account,the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).For security reasons, we have to make sure itâ€™s really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content: Itâ€™s important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary toÂ connect your smartphoneÂ or to send and receiveÂ MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:Delivery address,Â password, orÂ tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.NameÂ andÂ sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.Email address: Youâ€™ll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify itâ€™s really you changing your information so we canâ€™t change any personal data over email.Phone number: You can now change your phone number yourself at any time in the app. Just go toÂ ğŸ‘¤ My AccountÂ and selectÂ SettingsÂ thenÂ Personal Settings.Note: To be able to update your phone number in the app, you must use your paired device, meaning the smartphone linked to your account.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
Looking for support or have a questionIf you don't wish to make a complaint but you have questions about our products or need help with your account, weâ€™re always happy to assist. You can email us at support@n26.com(new tab) (new tab), or just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.Raising a complaintWeâ€™re sorry you feel the need to raise a complaint, please see below for the ways you are able to do this.Â If you are dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can send us an email from your registered email address* or send your complaint via post to the address to:N26 Bank GmbH â€“ Complaint Management
KlosterstraÃŸe 62, 10179 Berlin, GermanyTo submit your complaint via email please write to the following email address reclamaciones.es@n26.com(new tab).In the case you have a German (DE) IBAN, please write to reclamaciones@n26.com(new tab).

Alternatively you can request to raise a complaint via our live support team and they will be happy to assist.Â When filing a complaint, please always include:Your full name email and home addressThe product or service you're unhappy withA description of your complaint and when this occurred.Â You can also include any supporting documentation you have in relation to your complaintÂ Weâ€™ll contact you via email to confirm that weâ€™ve received your complaint and then begin our investigation. In case we need more information from you, our Complaint Management department will reach out directly via email with an explanation of the information required.

Once our Complaint Management department has investigated your concerns we will provide you with a final decision via email.Â We have one month to resolve a complaint for Spanish customers. If the complaint is related to a payment service dispute we have 15 working days to resolve your complaint.If you are unhappy with the outcome of your complaintIf you are not satisfied with the resolution provided, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party.For example:You can escalate to Banco de EspaÃ±a - Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones located on Calle AlcalÃ¡ 48, 28014 MadridCustomers with a German (DE) IBAN who are not satisfied with the response received to the complaint can also contact one of the following arbitration bodies.For example:An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank)Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt fÃ¼r Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht â€“ BaFin)Â The European Commission has also set up the Online Dispute Resolution platform to help consumers dispute out of court.We are committed to constantly improving our products and services and your feedback makes this possible. Should you wish to provide us with feedback regarding anything, please write to us at ideas@n26.com(new tab) (new tab).* We can only discuss account related matters from an email address registered with the N26 account.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.In the request form youâ€™ll find an attached coupon for legitimation at Deutsche Post AG. Go to your nearest Deutsch Post office, in order to prove your identity with the coupon.In addition, send us the completed and signed request via post to:
N26 Bank GmbH
Stw.: ZKG Basiskonto
KlosterstraÃŸe 62
10179 Berlin, DeutschlandOnce weâ€™ve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, weâ€™ll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).You then send us your signed contract via post to our address.As soon as we receive the contract weâ€™ll open a Basiskonto for you. Youâ€™ll receive a notification about the delivery of your card and access to your account.

title: Why canâ€™t I get a Basiskonto?
content: Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. Thatâ€™s the case if you:Live outside of a supported country.Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. You didnâ€™t meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content: You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6â‚¬ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. If you donâ€™t have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. Â Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content: An N26 bank account is free.*Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:Pricing in Germany(new tab)Pricing in Austria(new tab)Pricing in France(new tab)Pricing in Spain(new tab)Pricing in Italy(new tab)Pricing in the rest of Europe(new tab)*If weâ€™re not able to offer you an N26 account based on ourÂ minimum requirements(new tab), you may be able to open anÂ N26 Flex account.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.Upgrade to N26 MetalÂ and youâ€™ll receive 10 additionalÂ Spaces, dedicated Customer Support, access to exclusive partner offerings(new tab), as well as the N26 MetalÂ insurance package, provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which covers a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance. Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

You can purchase an extra N26 Metal card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app. Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 Metal(new tab):N26 Metal features an NFC-enabled Mastercard with a metal core in your choice of charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey.If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card If you upgrade to N26 Metal, the monthly fee of â‚¬16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app. *Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.If youâ€™re already a N26 You member, you donâ€™t have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app. Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.You can upgrade to N26 YouÂ during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's(new tab) and your new card will be on the way. Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. The membership fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14â‚¬ through your N26 app.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content: N26 You(new tab) orÂ N26 Metal(new tab)Â contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation periodCancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract endsStop your membershipâ€™s renewal up to 1 month before it expiresFind in details how to do so below. RevocationYou can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you wonâ€™t be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.Cancel your membership at any time*If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.Stop the renewal of your membership You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:Log into the mobile app and go to ğŸ‘¤ My AccountSelect N26 You/MetalTap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership you can also see your membership expiration date hereConfirm the cancellation via the push message we send youYou can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means youâ€™ll keep your insurance coverage as long as youâ€™re still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. Weâ€™ll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.Weâ€™ll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, youâ€™ll receive 10 additionalÂ SpacesÂ and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account'sÂ insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.
Snow and mountain rescue.Â Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 10â‚¬ through your N26 app (available in Germany, Spain, Austria, Italy). If youâ€™re an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, youâ€™ll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: Keep these in mind when consideringÂ N26 You(new tab):The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of â‚¬9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If youâ€™re a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, youâ€™ll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you donâ€™t cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content: YourÂ N26 You(new tab)Â andÂ N26 Metal(new tab)Â membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*To report a claim, log into your app, go to ğŸ‘¤ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.There you'll find:A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)Your account and contract information, including your N26 You or N26 Metal IDThe option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergencyFor emergencies, please have the following information ready:The full address and telephone number of your current locationNames of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)An exact description of the situation*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content: â„¹ï¸Â Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.Itâ€™s not yet possible to switch between accounts so itâ€™s important to know if N26 Business is right for you:The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you canâ€™t have your companyâ€™s name on the account or card.The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. Itâ€™s currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (itâ€™s available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies arenâ€™t possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money
